page.title: 08Transport Ashford Carbonell
page.content: The area around Ashford is mainly countryside.The nearest town is three miles away,Ludlow.There is a bus service to Ludlow on a Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday. We conducted a survey to find out how many people owned their own transport.This is what we learned from our survey:We found out that only two houses in our survey area had not got a car. It is essential that you have a car if you live in Ashford because there is a very limited bus service and you would be unable to get about , to do shopping or follow leisure activities or go to work.There is a train line that runs through Ashford but no station.If there was a station it would provide access to Hereford and Shrewsbury.
